T02TD2275E:125a-1: sva aa dhishth'a na kra ma /
T02TD2275E:125a-3: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa /
T02TD2275E:125a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2275E:125a-5: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i cha'i khyad par bstan pas sprul pa sgyu ma'i bdag / dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo nyid la lhag par rol pa'i ro gang ci yang rung //
T02TD2275E:125a-6: rdo rje bdud rtsi dpal ldan gang la gang gis bstod pa de lta'ang 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin na //
T02TD2275E:125a-7: ji ltar brjod pa 'di las gzhan su bcom ldan de la kun nas phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD2275E:125a-8: / gang yang mngon dga'i rgyal ba'i sku mdzes gcig pu nyid //
T02TD2275E:125a-9: su yang mkhas rnams snying gar gnyid sad mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD2275E:125a-10: gang zhig shar bas mnyam pa'i dus na dbang po dang //
T02TD2275E:125a-11: yul rnams bcas pa nub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2275E:125a-12: gang la spros pa dpal ldan bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'dzin cing //
T02TD2275E:125a-13: gang zhig cha byad spros bral dri med shes rab rang bzhin kun du 'gro //
T02TD2275E:125a-14: dpag bsam lcug mas mngon mtshungs gnas gsum nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa gang //
T02TD2275E:125a-15: dpal ldan dro rje tshig mtshan btsun mo de la kun nas phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD2275E:125a-16: / gang zhig rdo rje yan lag ma zhes kun nas dran pas kyang //
T02TD2275E:125a-17: nyon mongs bral ba'i bde ba 'ba' zhig sar ni bde 'gro ba //
T02TD2275E:125a-18: de la mi phyed gus pa'i khur gyi lcid kyis mgrin smad nas //
T02TD2275E:125a-19: de yi zhabs kyi padma'i rdul la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2275E:125b-0: gang gis bka' @125b drin zer gyis spros pa bdag gis de nyid ni //
T02TD2275E:125b-1: rin chen 'od kyis bskor bas mun pa'i tshogs ni rab bcom zhing //
T02TD2275E:125b-2: rnyog med mig gis rang gi rnam par rol pa ring mthong ba'i //
T02TD2275E:125b-3: bla ma rnam par snang byed de la yang dag 'dud //
T02TD2275E:125b-4: gang zhig srid pa dang ni zhi gnas 'gram du dga' ba rgyu mthun 'bab //
T02TD2275E:125b-5: ye shes nam mkha'i chu bos yid rgyas dpal ldan bla ma gsum pa nyid //
T02TD2275E:125b-6: dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo btsun mo'i tshogs rnams shes rab pha rol phyin rang bzhin //
T02TD2275E:125b-7: gang zhig gnas gsum ston pa gcig pu dam pa'i dbang phyug dam pa'i sems la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02TD2275E:125b-8: gang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi yul du 'jog cing dug 'dra ba'i //
T02TD2275E:125b-9: 'khor ba bcud kyis len gyi rnam par mdzad pa rang dbang sngags 'dra ba //
T02TD2275E:125b-10: gang gi sa ste dbang po'i blo yis min 'gro gsum khang chung gi //
T02TD2275E:125b-11: dri ma 'khrud nas gcig pu bla ma dam pa'i ngag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2275E:125b-12: gang gang dran par yang dag gnas pas snying ga padma'i mdud pa ni //
T02TD2275E:125b-13: dbugs 'byin grol bar sbyor ba'i bla ma'i bka' lung de nges ni //
T02TD2275E:125b-14: nyi phyed 'od 'dra'i tshogs kyis gnas gsum khang bu'i mun 'dzoms shing //
T02TD2275E:125b-15: rmongs dang 'gal la bag ni du la bar bcad pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2275E:125b-16: bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul 'di cung zad dran pa yi //
T02TD2275E:125b-17: yon tan spros pa yongs su gyur pas dpal ldan pa //
T02TD2275E:125b-18: mi bde ba yi bdag nyid kyang ni mchog bde bar //
T02TD2275E:125b-19: gal te grub na 'di las bsgrub bya gzhan med do //
T02TD2275E:125b-20: bdag ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la gus dang ldan pas rga shi dang //
T02TD2275E:125b-21: nad dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs mda' 'dra'i zug rdu'i tshogs 'dis ngal ba med //
T02TD2275E:125b-22: lus can rnams la ye shes bdud rtsi skal ba ma bgos mi nus pas //
T02TD2275E:125b-23: gang zhig bdag gis spyad pa de ni yongs su gdung ba che //
T02TD2275E:125b-24: blo yi yul min des na gang gi spyod yul min //
T02TD2275E:125b-25: gzhi yi gtam gyi rim pa bla mas gsungs pa ring //
T02TD2275E:125b-26: de yi rim pas snying rje la sogs yon tan dag / dad ldan rnams la snying gi gnas su rang nyid skye //
T02TD2275E:126a-0: @126a * // dngos po 'di kun gcig pa dang //
T02TD2275E:126a-1: du ma'i rang bzhin cha bral te //
T02TD2275E:126a-2: 'di ni zhen pa'i sbyor bral bas //
T02TD2275E:126a-4: spu langs myu gu'i tshogs kyis rab dga' yi //
T02TD2275E:126a-5: mchi mas mig gang rdzi ma bkrus nas su //
T02TD2275E:126a-6: ches bstan gus pa'i khur gyis mgo 'dzin ni //
T02TD2275E:126a-7: dpag bsam bla ma dam pa la 'dud do //
T02TD2275E:126a-8: gsal bar spyi bor lag sngar cung zad byed //
T02TD2275E:126a-9: rab dga' bcas pas nor 'dzin yan lag 'khyud //
T02TD2275E:126a-10: yang dag gus pa'i skud pas yid kyi me tog ni //
T02TD2275E:126a-11: mdud par brgyus pa'i bdag gi phreng ba 'di bzhes shig / mgon po khyod kyi bka' gnad nyung 'dus shes rab ni //
T02TD2275E:126a-12: rgyal po'i bu mo cha las mkhas 'dra dbang du byed //
T02TD2275E:126a-13: 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin rol pa'i ro yi bde ba ni //
T02TD2275E:126a-14: 'ba' zhig rjes su myong ba de ni yid gcig bsod nams can //
T02TD2275E:126a-15: lang tsho'i snying rjes brlan pas khyod kyis sngon med lam gsungs pa //
T02TD2275E:126a-16: 'gro ba bgrod bya med dang 'gro med ces bya ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2275E:126a-17: gang du gom pa bor ba tsam gyis mnyam med bde ba'i rgyun bcas pa //
T02TD2275E:126a-18: gang tshe srid dang zhi ba cung zad tha dad ma mthong ngo //
T02TD2275E:126a-19: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha chen pos mdzad pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa grub pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2275E:126a-21: // / pandi ta chen po pa sh'anta bha dra'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02TD2275E:126a-22: bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
